text: @narendramodi Maanya Pradhanmantri Ji...your governments efforts to contain Covid19 is very much applauded 👏👏👏👏....I am a small business man and  like me there are many businesses which have very small staff and have to run every day to pay staff salaries, loan emi and other commitments,
